short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks if an image is a true PNG with a transparent background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly verify the transparency of PNG images with the PNG Transparency Checker extension. This handy tool integrates directly into your browser's context menu, allowing you to right-click on any image and instantly check if it has a transparent background. Perfect for web developers, designers, and anyone who works with images, this extension simplifies your workflow by providing a quick and accurate transparency check. No more guessing or manual inspectionâ€”just right-click, select "Check if PNG is Transparent," and get an immediate alert on the transparency status of the image. Enhance your productivity and ensure the quality of your images with this essential tool.
